title.value: Эколого-экономические и технические аспекты производства и использования биомассы на сельскохозяйственных землях в энергетических целях
Environmental, economic and technical aspects of the production and use of biomass on agricultural lands for energy purposes
Environmental, economic and technical aspects of the production and use of biomass on agricultural lands for energy purposes

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Kulakovskaya, T.V., Belarus State Economic Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Development of multifunctional agriculture in European countries contributed to the emergence of new scientific fields, exploring the issues of production of feeds, foodstuffs and biomass for energy industry in order to protect biodiversity and natural resources. Climatic change and the high cost of fossil fuels contribute the development of the production of biomass for energy purposes. The influence of the species composition of grasses, used for biomass production, intensity of the silage production for biogas and biofuels processing are investigated in laboratory and field conditions, the results of the experiments are presented in the article. Ecological, economic and technical considerations of the production and utilization of biomass for energetic purposes are substantiated. The most important advantaged of biomass production in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus are evaluated.
